metadata.title: Frontend sprint plan for research site

messages.say:
write a simple and brief plan.md for this frontend sprint goal


i want to host my page using github page free


Sprint Goal: Build an AJAX-based, pretty, & publicly available frontend using Tailwind/BootstrapLinks to an external site. (among other JS libraries) for Tren's backend @ https://mil.psy.ntu.edu.tw:5000 :
 
/terms : look up all available terms
/terms/: look up terms associated with t1
/query//studies: logical search


Tren’s backend
Server: https://mil.psy.ntu.edu.tw:5000
API endpoints:
    "/terms",
    "/terms/",
    "/query//studies",


Query examples:
https://mil.psy.ntu.edu.tw:5000/terms
https://mil.psy.ntu.edu.tw:5000/terms/amygdala
https://mil.psy.ntu.edu.tw:5000/query/amygdala%20not%20emotion/studies

I'll create a simple sprint plan for your GitHub Pages frontend project.


Create File: Create a sprint plan for AJAX frontend project hosted on GitHub Pages


View your plan


I've created a concise sprint plan that breaks down your goal into 4 user stories (one per API endpoint plus deployment) and lists the key technical tasks. It's structured to keep you focused on the essentials for GitHub Pages hosting.
